excerpt: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things you did…

question.title: 到底是会为做了的事情后悔还是会为不做的事情后悔？

content: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things you didn't do than by the ones you did. So throw off the bowlines, Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover. -- Mark Twain
